snippet: The Committee to Protect Journalists has reported at least 14 journalists who are missing or have been abducted, but the total number of kidnappings is believed to be much higher.
abstract: Abductions of journalists inside Syria have increased sharply in 2013 as conflict has worsened and insurgency has turned more jihadist and chaotic; Committee to Protect Journalists reports at least 14 journalists are missing or have been abducted, but total number of kidnappings is believed to be much higher.
lead_paragraph: The Committee to Protect Journalists has reported at least 14 journalists who are missing or have been abducted, but the total number of kidnappings is believed to be much higher.
